description: This file provides functions for managing 'classes' entities in a gym management system, including listing, retrieving by ID, creating, updating, deleting, and specialized listing functions such as listing by trainer and upcoming classes. It interacts with a database via Supabase.

methods.name: list({ page = 1, limit = 20, q = '', trainerId, from, to, sort } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of classes from the database with optional filters such as pagination, search query, trainer ID, date range, and sorting order.

methods.name: getById(id)
methods.description: Retrieves a single class record by its unique identifier.

methods.name: create(payload)
methods.description: Creates a new class record in the database using provided payload data.

methods.name: update(id, patch)
methods.description: Updates an existing class identified by ID with the provided patch data.

methods.name: remove(id)
methods.description: Deletes a class record by its ID.

methods.name: listByTrainer(trainerId, { page = 1, limit = 20 } = {})
methods.description: Lists classes associated with a specific trainer ID, with pagination options.

methods.name: listUpcoming({ page = 1, limit = 20 } = {})
methods.description: Lists future scheduled classes, sorted by title ascending, with pagination.

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^export async function list({ page = 1, limit = 20, q = '', trainerId, from, to, sort } = {}) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ page = 1, limit = 20, q = '', trainerId, from, to, sort } = {})
